roleset.name: to reside with another
roleset.note: COHABIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cohabit' based on survey of sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. VerbNet entry 36.1. Comparison with 'inhabit,' and 'agree.' (from cohabit.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: focus, first or plural resident mention

example.name: all inhabitants in one mention, a-typical residence
example.src: all inhabitants in one mention, a-typical residence
example.type: all inhabitants in one mention, a-typical residence
example.text: Yet Callister, my Barbarian, Ybarra and Zaki comfortably cohabit in a single group show.
example.arg: Callister, my Barbarian, Ybarra and Zaki
